snippet: The authorities say David Baril, 30, who was shot by the police, attacked several people at random in Manhattan last week.
abstract: Authorities arraign New York City man David Baril on multiple assault charges, identifying him as man who attacked several people at random with hammer; police disclose that Baril, who was arraigned from his hospital bed, has schizophrenia and recently resided at shelter for mentally ill.
lead_paragraph: The authorities say David Baril, 30, who was shot by the police, attacked several people at random in Manhattan last week.

headline.main: Hammer Attack Suspect Is Arraigned From Hospital Bed
